longDef.en: upset and angry because someone that you love seems interested in another person
longDef.cn: 妒忌的；好妒忌的；吃醋的

examples.en: Anna says she feels jealous every time another woman looks at her boyfriend.
examples.cn: 安娜说每次别的女人看她的男朋友她都会感到妒忌。

longDef.en: unhappy and angry because someone has something that you want

examples.en: He had always been very jealous of his brother's good looks.
examples.cn: 他兄弟的外貌总是让他嫉妒。

longDef.en: extremely careful in protecting someone or something
longDef.cn: 小心守护的，唯恐失去的

examples.en: She is very jealous of her independence, and doesn't want to get married.
examples.cn: 她很珍惜自己的自由，不想结婚。

examples.en: Her parents used to keep a jealous watch over her when she was young.
examples.cn: 她小时候父母一直小心呵护她。
